name: DPRun
tagline: DPRun is a standalone C++ Windows/Wine utility for starting DirectPlay lobbyable applications.
body: # DPRun DPRun is a standalone C++ Windows/Wine utility for starting DirectPlay lobbyable applications. ## Usage ``` ./DPRun http://my-lobby-server.com/api/game-description/10 ./DPRun game=aoc playername=TestPlayer ``` ```html Join game #11 ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
